AutoPvEStartTimeSeconds.label: AutoPvEStartTimeSeconds
AutoPvEStartTimeSeconds.description: States when the PvE mode should start in a PvPvE server. Valid values are from 0 to 86400. Options bAutoPvETimer, bAutoPvEUseSystemTime and AutoPvEStopTimeSeconds must also be set. Note: although at code level it is defined as a floating point number, it is suggested to use an integer instead.

AutoPvEStopTimeSeconds.label: AutoPvEStopTimeSeconds
AutoPvEStopTimeSeconds.description: States when the PvE mode should end in a PvPvE server. Valid values are from 0 to 86400. Options bAutoPvETimer, bAutoPvEUseSystemTime and AutoPvEStopTimeSeconds must also be set. Note: although at code level it is defined as a floating point number, it is suggested to use an integer instead.

BabyCuddleGracePeriodMultiplier.label: BabyCuddleGracePeriodMultiplier
BabyCuddleGracePeriodMultiplier.description: Scales how long after delaying cuddling with the Baby before Imprinting Quality starts to decrease.

BabyCuddleIntervalMultiplier.label: BabyCuddleIntervalMultiplier
BabyCuddleIntervalMultiplier.description: Scales how often babies needs attention for imprinting. More often means you'll need to cuddle with them more frequently to gain Imprinting Quality. Scales always according to default BabyMatureSpeedMultiplier value: set at 1.0 the imprint request is every 8 hours. See also The Imprinting formula how it affects the imprinting amount at each baby care/cuddle.

BabyCuddleLoseImprintQualitySpeedMultipl.label: BabyCuddleLoseImprintQualitySpeedMultiplier
BabyCuddleLoseImprintQualitySpeedMultipl.description: Scales how fast Imprinting Quality decreases after the grace period if you haven't yet cuddled with the Baby.

BabyFoodConsumptionSpeedMultiplier.label: BabyFoodConsumptionSpeedMultiplier
BabyFoodConsumptionSpeedMultiplier.description: Scales the speed that baby tames eat their food. A lower value decreases (by percentage) the food eaten by babies.

BabyImprintAmountMultiplier.label: BabyImprintAmountMultiplier
BabyImprintAmountMultiplier.description: Scales the percentage each imprint provides. A higher value, will rise the amount of imprinting % at each baby care/cuddle, a lower value will decrease it. This multiplier is global, meaning it will affect the imprinting progression of every species. See also The Imprinting formula how it affects the imprinting amount at each baby care/cuddle.

BabyImprintingStatScaleMultiplier.label: BabyImprintingStatScaleMultiplier
BabyImprintingStatScaleMultiplier.description: Scales how much of an effect on stats the Imprinting Quality has. Set it to 0 to effectively disable the system.

BabyMatureSpeedMultiplier.label: BabyMatureSpeedMultiplier
BabyMatureSpeedMultiplier.description: Scales the maturation speed of babies. A higher number decreases (by percentage) time needed for baby tames to mature. See Times for Breeding tables for values at 1.0, see The Imprinting formula how it affects the imprinting amount at each baby care/cuddle.

bAllowUnclaimDinos.label: bAllowUnclaimDinos
bAllowUnclaimDinos.description: If False, prevents players to unclaim tame creatures.

bAllowCustomRecipes.label: bAllowCustomRecipes
bAllowCustomRecipes.description: If False, disabled custom RP-oriented Recipe/Cooking System (including Skill-Based results).

bAllowFlyerSpeedLeveling.label: bAllowFlyerSpeedLeveling
bAllowFlyerSpeedLeveling.description: Specifies whether flyer creatures can have their Movement Speed levelled up.

bAllowPlatformSaddleMultiFloors.label: bAllowPlatformSaddleMultiFloors
bAllowPlatformSaddleMultiFloors.description: If True, allows multiple platform floors.

bAllowUnlimitedRespecs.label: bAllowUnlimitedRespecs
bAllowUnlimitedRespecs.description: If True, allows more than one usage of Mindwipe Tonic without 24 hours cooldown.

BaseTemperatureMultiplier.label: BaseTemperatureMultiplier
BaseTemperatureMultiplier.description: Specifies the map base temperature scaling factor: lower value makes the environment colder, higher value makes the environment hotter.

bAutoPvETimer.label: bAutoPvETimer
bAutoPvETimer.description: If True, enabled PvE mode in a PvPvE server at pre-specified times. The option bAutoPvEUseSystemTime determinates what kind of time to use, while AutoPvEStartTimeSeconds and AutoPvEStopTimeSeconds set the begin and end time of PvE mode.

bAutoPvEUseSystemTime.label: bAutoPvEUseSystemTime
bAutoPvEUseSystemTime.description: If True, PvE mode begin and end times in a PvPvE server will refer to the server system time instead of in-game world time. Options bAutoPvETimer, AutoPvEStartTimeSeconds and AutoPvEStopTimeSeconds must also be set.

bAutoUnlockAllEngrams.label: bAutoUnlockAllEngrams
bAutoUnlockAllEngrams.description: If True, unlocks all Engrams available. Ignores OverrideEngramEntries and OverrideNamedEngramEntries entries.

bDisableDinoBreeding.label: bDisableDinoBreeding
bDisableDinoBreeding.description: If True, prevents tames to be bred.

bDisableDinoRiding.label: bDisableDinoRiding
bDisableDinoRiding.description: If True, prevents players to ride tames.

bDisableDinoTaming.label: bDisableDinoTaming
bDisableDinoTaming.description: If True, prevents players to tame wild creatures.

bDisableFriendlyFire.label: bDisableFriendlyFire
bDisableFriendlyFire.description: If True, prevents Friendly-Fire (among tribe mates/tames/structures).

bDisableLootCrates.label: bDisableLootCrates
bDisableLootCrates.description: If True, prevents spawning of Loot crates (artifact creates will still spawn).

bDisablePhotoMode.label: bDisablePhotoMode
bDisablePhotoMode.description: Defines if photo mode is allowed (False) or not (True).

bDisableStructurePlacementCollision.label: bDisableStructurePlacementCollision
bDisableStructurePlacementCollision.description: If True, allows for structures to clip into the terrain.

bFlyerPlatformAllowUnalignedDinoBasing.label: bFlyerPlatformAllowUnalignedDinoBasing
bFlyerPlatformAllowUnalignedDinoBasing.description: If True, Quetz platforms will allow any non-allied tame to base on them when they are flying.

bIgnoreStructuresPreventionVolumes.label: bIgnoreStructuresPreventionVolumes
bIgnoreStructuresPreventionVolumes.description: If True, enables building areas where normally it's not allowed, such around some maps' Obelisks, in the Aberration Portal and in Mission Volumes areas on Genesis: Part 1. Note: in Genesis: Part 1 this settings is enabled by default and there is an ad hoc settings called bGenesisUseStructuresPreventionVolumes to disable it.

bIncreasePvPRespawnInterval.label: bIncreasePvPRespawnInterval
bIncreasePvPRespawnInterval.description: If False, disables PvP additional re-spawn time (IncreasePvPRespawnIntervalBaseAmount) that scales (IncreasePvPRespawnIntervalMultiplier) when a player is killed by a team within a certain amount of time (IncreasePvPRespawnIntervalCheckPeriod).

bOnlyAllowSpecifiedEngrams.label: bOnlyAllowSpecifiedEngrams
bOnlyAllowSpecifiedEngrams.description: If True, any Engram not explicitly specified by OverrideEngramEntries or OverrideNamedEngramEntries list will be hidden. All Items and Blueprints based on hidden Engrams will be removed.

bPassiveDefensesDamageRiderlessDinos.label: bPassiveDefensesDamageRiderlessDinos
bPassiveDefensesDamageRiderlessDinos.description: If True, allows spike walls to damage wild/riderless creatures.

bPvEAllowTribeWar.label: bPvEAllowTribeWar
bPvEAllowTribeWar.description: If False, disables capability for Tribes to officially declare war on each other for mutually-agreed-upon period of time.

bPvEAllowTribeWarCancel.label: bPvEAllowTribeWarCancel
bPvEAllowTribeWarCancel.description: If True, allows cancellation of an agreed-upon war before it has actually started.

bPvEDisableFriendlyFire.label: bPvEDisableFriendlyFire
bPvEDisableFriendlyFire.description: If True, disabled Friendly-Fire (among tribe mates/tames/structures) in PvE servers.

bUseCorpseLocator.label: bUseCorpseLocator
bUseCorpseLocator.description: If False, prevents survivors to see a green light beam at the location of their dead body.

bUseDinoLevelUpAnimations.label: bUseDinoLevelUpAnimations
bUseDinoLevelUpAnimations.description: If False, tame creatures on level-up will not perform the related animation.

bUseSingleplayerSettings.label: bUseSingleplayerSettings
bUseSingleplayerSettings.description: If True, all game settings will be more balanced for an individual player experience. Useful for dedicated server with a very small amount of players. See Single Player Settings section for more details.

bUseTameLimitForStructuresOnly.label: bUseTameLimitForStructuresOnly
bUseTameLimitForStructuresOnly.description: If True will make Tame Units only be applied and used for Platforms with Structures and Rafts effectively disabling Tame Units for tames without Platform Structures.

ConfigAddNPCSpawnEntriesContainer.label: ConfigAddNPCSpawnEntriesContainer
ConfigAddNPCSpawnEntriesContainer.description: Adds specific creatures in spawn areas. See Creature Spawn related section for more detail.

ConfigOverrideItemCraftingCosts.label: ConfigOverrideItemCraftingCosts
ConfigOverrideItemCraftingCosts.description: Overrides items crafting resource requirements. See Item related section for more details.

ConfigOverrideItemMaxQuantity.label: ConfigOverrideItemMaxQuantity
ConfigOverrideItemMaxQuantity.description: Overrides items stack size on a per-item basis. See Item related section for more details.

ConfigOverrideNPCSpawnEntriesContainer.label: ConfigOverrideNPCSpawnEntriesContainer
ConfigOverrideNPCSpawnEntriesContainer.description: Overrides specific creatures in spawn areas. See Creature Spawn related section for more details.

ConfigOverrideSupplyCrateItems.label: ConfigOverrideSupplyCrateItems
ConfigOverrideSupplyCrateItems.description: Overrides items contained in loot crates. See Items related section for more details.

ConfigSubtractNPCSpawnEntriesContainer.label: ConfigSubtractNPCSpawnEntriesContainer
ConfigSubtractNPCSpawnEntriesContainer.description: Removes specific creatures in spawn areas. See Creature Spawn related section for more detail.

CraftingSkillBonusMultiplier.label: CraftingSkillBonusMultiplier
CraftingSkillBonusMultiplier.description: Scales the bonus received from upgrading the Crafting Skill.

CraftXPMultiplier.label: CraftXPMultiplier
CraftXPMultiplier.description: Scales the amount of XP earned for crafting.

CropDecaySpeedMultiplier.label: CropDecaySpeedMultiplier
CropDecaySpeedMultiplier.description: Scales the speed of crop decay in plots. A higher value decrease (by percentage) speed of crop decay in plots.

CropGrowthSpeedMultiplier.label: CropGrowthSpeedMultiplier
CropGrowthSpeedMultiplier.description: Scales the speed of crop growth in plots. A higher value increases (by percentage) speed of crop growth.

CustomRecipeEffectivenessMultiplier.label: CustomRecipeEffectivenessMultiplier
CustomRecipeEffectivenessMultiplier.description: Scales the effectiveness of custom recipes. A higher value increases (by percentage) their effectiveness.

CustomRecipeSkillMultiplier.label: CustomRecipeSkillMultiplier
CustomRecipeSkillMultiplier.description: Scales the effect of the players crafting speed level that is used as a base for the formula in creating a custom recipe. A higher number increases (by percentage) the effect.

DestroyTamesOverLevelClamp.label: DestroyTamesOverLevelClamp
DestroyTamesOverLevelClamp.description: Tames that exceed that level will be deleted on server start. Official servers have it set to 450.

DinoClassDamageMultipliers.label: DinoClassDamageMultipliers
DinoClassDamageMultipliers.description: Globally overrides wild creatures damages. See Creature Stats related section for more detail.

DinoClassResistanceMultipliers.label: DinoClassResistanceMultipliers
DinoClassResistanceMultipliers.description: Globally overrides wild creatures resistance. See Creature Stats related section for more detail.

DinoHarvestingDamageMultiplier.label: DinoHarvestingDamageMultiplier
DinoHarvestingDamageMultiplier.description: Scales the damage done to a harvestable item/entity by a tame. A higher number increases (by percentage) the speed of harvesting.

DinoSpawnWeightMultipliers.label: DinoSpawnWeightMultipliers
DinoSpawnWeightMultipliers.description: Globally overrides creatures spawns likelihood. See Creature Spawn related section for more detail.

DinoTurretDamageMultiplier.label: DinoTurretDamageMultiplier
DinoTurretDamageMultiplier.description: Scales the damage done by Turrets towards a creature. A higher values increases it (by percentage).

EggHatchSpeedMultiplier.label: EggHatchSpeedMultiplier
EggHatchSpeedMultiplier.description: Scales the time needed for a fertilised egg to hatch. A higher value decreases (by percentage) that time.

EngramEntryAutoUnlocks.label: EngramEntryAutoUnlocks
EngramEntryAutoUnlocks.description: Automatically unlocks the specified Engram when reaching the level specified. See Engram Entries related section for more detail.

ExcludeItemIndices.label: ExcludeItemIndices
ExcludeItemIndices.description: Excludes an item from supply crates specifying its Item ID. You can have multiple lines of this option.

FastDecayInterval.label: FastDecayInterval
FastDecayInterval.description: Specifies the decay period for "Fast Decay" structures (such as pillars or lone foundations). Value is in seconds. FastDecayUnsnappedCoreStructures in GameUserSettings.ini must be set to True as well to take any effect.

FishingLootQualityMultiplier.label: FishingLootQualityMultiplier
FishingLootQualityMultiplier.description: Sets the quality of items that have a quality when fishing. Valid values are from 1.0 to 5.0.

FuelConsumptionIntervalMultiplier.label: FuelConsumptionIntervalMultiplier
FuelConsumptionIntervalMultiplier.description: Defines the interval of fuel consumption.

GenericXPMultiplier.label: GenericXPMultiplier
GenericXPMultiplier.description: Scales the amount of XP earned for generic XP (automatic over time).

GlobalCorpseDecompositionTimeMultiplier.label: GlobalCorpseDecompositionTimeMultiplier
GlobalCorpseDecompositionTimeMultiplier.description: Scales the decomposition time of corpses, (player and creature), globally. Higher values prolong the time.

GlobalItemDecompositionTimeMultiplier.label: GlobalItemDecompositionTimeMultiplier
GlobalItemDecompositionTimeMultiplier.description: Scales the decomposition time of dropped items, loot bags etc. globally. Higher values prolong the time.

GlobalPoweredBatteryDurabilityDecreasePe.label: GlobalPoweredBatteryDurabilityDecreasePerSecond
GlobalPoweredBatteryDurabilityDecreasePe.description: Specifies the rate at which charge batteries are used in electrical objects.

GlobalSpoilingTimeMultiplier.label: GlobalSpoilingTimeMultiplier
GlobalSpoilingTimeMultiplier.description: Scales the spoiling time of perishables globally. Higher values prolong the time.

HairGrowthSpeedMultiplier.label: HairGrowthSpeedMultiplier
HairGrowthSpeedMultiplier.description: Scales the hair growth. Higher values increase speed of growth.

HarvestResourceItemAmountClassMultiplier.label: HarvestResourceItemAmountClassMultipliers
HarvestResourceItemAmountClassMultiplier.description: Scales on a per-resource type basis, the amount of resources harvested. See Items related section for more details.

HarvestXPMultiplier.label: HarvestXPMultiplier
HarvestXPMultiplier.description: Scales the amount of XP earned for harvesting.

IncreasePvPRespawnIntervalBaseAmount.label: IncreasePvPRespawnIntervalBaseAmount
IncreasePvPRespawnIntervalBaseAmount.description: If bIncreasePvPRespawnInterval is True, sets the additional PvP re-spawn time in seconds that scales (IncreasePvPRespawnIntervalMultiplier) when a player is killed by a team within a certain amount of time (IncreasePvPRespawnIntervalCheckPeriod).

IncreasePvPRespawnIntervalCheckPeriod.label: IncreasePvPRespawnIntervalCheckPeriod
IncreasePvPRespawnIntervalCheckPeriod.description: If bIncreasePvPRespawnInterval is True, sets the amount of time in seconds within a player re-spawn time increases (IncreasePvPRespawnIntervalBaseAmount) and scales (IncreasePvPRespawnIntervalMultiplier) when it is killed by a team in PvP.

IncreasePvPRespawnIntervalMultiplier.label: IncreasePvPRespawnIntervalMultiplier
IncreasePvPRespawnIntervalMultiplier.description: If bIncreasePvPRespawnInterval is True, scales the PvP additional re-spawn time (IncreasePvPRespawnIntervalBaseAmount) when a player is killed by a team within a certain amount of time (IncreasePvPRespawnIntervalCheckPeriod).

ItemStatClamps[0].label: ItemStatClamps[GenericQuality]
ItemStatClamps[0].description: Clamps the Generic Quality stat for items. Default: 0 (no clamp).

ItemStatClamps[1].label: ItemStatClamps[Armor]
ItemStatClamps[1].description: Clamps the Armor stat for items. Official server clamp: 19800.

ItemStatClamps[2].label: ItemStatClamps[MaxDurability]
ItemStatClamps[2].description: Clamps the Max Durability stat for items. Default: 0 (no clamp).

ItemStatClamps[3].label: ItemStatClamps[WeaponDamagePercent]
ItemStatClamps[3].description: Clamps the Weapon Damage Percent stat for items. Official server clamp: 19800.

ItemStatClamps[4].label: ItemStatClamps[WeaponClipAmmo]
ItemStatClamps[4].description: Clamps the Weapon Clip Ammo stat for items. Default: 0 (no clamp).

ItemStatClamps[5].label: ItemStatClamps[HypothermalInsulation]
ItemStatClamps[5].description: Clamps the Hypothermal Insulation stat for items. Default: 0 (no clamp).

ItemStatClamps[6].label: ItemStatClamps[Weight]
ItemStatClamps[6].description: Clamps the Weight stat for items. Default: 0 (no clamp).

ItemStatClamps[7].label: ItemStatClamps[HyperthermalInsulation]
ItemStatClamps[7].description: Clamps the Hyperthermal Insulation stat for items. Default: 0 (no clamp).

KillXPMultiplier.label: KillXPMultiplier
KillXPMultiplier.description: Scale the amount of XP earned for a kill.

LayEggIntervalMultiplier.label: LayEggIntervalMultiplier
LayEggIntervalMultiplier.description: Scales the time between eggs are spawning / being laid. Higher number increases it (by percentage).

LevelExperienceRampOverrides.label: LevelExperienceRampOverrides
LevelExperienceRampOverrides.description: Configures the total number of levels available to players and tame creatures and the experience points required to reach each level. See Players and tames levels override section for more details.

LimitNonPlayerDroppedItemsCount.label: LimitNonPlayerDroppedItemsCount
LimitNonPlayerDroppedItemsCount.description: Limits the number of dropped items in the area defined by LimitNonPlayerDroppedItemsRange. Official servers have it set to 600.

LimitNonPlayerDroppedItemsRange.label: LimitNonPlayerDroppedItemsRange
LimitNonPlayerDroppedItemsRange.description: Sets the area range (in Unreal Units) in which the option LimitNonPlayerDroppedItemsCount applies. Official servers have it set to 1600.

MatingIntervalMultiplier.label: MatingIntervalMultiplier
MatingIntervalMultiplier.description: Scales the interval between tames can mate. A lower value decreases it (on a percentage scale). Example: a value of 0.5 would allow tames to mate 50% sooner.

MatingSpeedMultiplier.label: MatingSpeedMultiplier
MatingSpeedMultiplier.description: Scales the speed at which tames mate with each other. A higher value increases it (by percentage). Example: MatingSpeedMultiplier=2.0 would cause tames to complete mating in half the normal time.

MaxAlliancesPerTribe.label: MaxAlliancesPerTribe
MaxAlliancesPerTribe.description: If set, defines the maximum alliances a tribe can form or be part of.

MaxFallSpeedMultiplier.label: MaxFallSpeedMultiplier
MaxFallSpeedMultiplier.description: Defines the falling speed multiplier at which players starts taking fall damage. The falling speed is based on the time players spent in the air while having a negated Z axis velocity meaning that the higher this setting is, the longer players can fall without taking fall damage. For example, having it set to 0.1 means players will no longer survive a regular jump while having it set very high such as to 100.0 means players will survive a fall from the sky limit, etc. This setting doesn't affect the gravity scale of the players so there won't be any physics difference to the character movements.

MaxNumberOfPlayersInTribe.label: MaxNumberOfPlayersInTribe
MaxNumberOfPlayersInTribe.description: Sets the maximum survivors allowed in a tribe. A value of 1 effectively disables tribes. The default value of 0 means there is no limit about how many survivors can be in a tribe.

MaxTribeLogs.label: MaxTribeLogs
MaxTribeLogs.description: Sets how many Tribe log entries are displayed for each tribe.

MaxTribesPerAlliance.label: MaxTribesPerAlliance
MaxTribesPerAlliance.description: If set, defines the maximum of tribes in an alliance.

NPCReplacements.label: NPCReplacements
NPCReplacements.description: Globally replaces specific creatures with another using class names. See Creature Spawn related section for more detail.

OverrideMaxExperiencePointsDino.label: OverrideMaxExperiencePointsDino
OverrideMaxExperiencePointsDino.description: Overrides the max XP cap of tame characters by exact specified amount.

OverrideMaxExperiencePointsPlayer.label: OverrideMaxExperiencePointsPlayer
OverrideMaxExperiencePointsPlayer.description: Overrides the max XP cap of players characters by exact specified amount.

OverrideEngramEntries.label: OverrideEngramEntries
OverrideEngramEntries.description: Configures the status and requirements for learning an engram, specified by its index. See Engram Entries related section for more detail.

OverrideNamedEngramEntries.label: OverrideNamedEngramEntries
OverrideNamedEngramEntries.description: Configures the status and requirements for learning an engram, specified by its name. See Engram Entries related section for more detail.

OverridePlayerLevelEngramPoints.label: OverridePlayerLevelEngramPoints
OverridePlayerLevelEngramPoints.description: Configures the number of engram points granted to players for each level gained. This option must be repeated for each player level set on the server, e.g.: if there are 65 player levels available this option should appear 65 times, with the first setting the engram points for reaching level 1, the next one setting engram points for level 2 and so on, all the way to the 65th which configures engram points for level 65.

PassiveTameIntervalMultiplier.label: PassiveTameIntervalMultiplier
PassiveTameIntervalMultiplier.description: Scales how often a survivor get tame requests for passive tame creatures.

PerLevelStatsMultiplier_Player[0].label: PerLevelStatsMultiplier_Player[Health]
PerLevelStatsMultiplier_Player[0].description: Scales Health gained per level for players. Default: 1.0

PerLevelStatsMultiplier_Player[1].label: PerLevelStatsMultiplier_Player[Stamina]
PerLevelStatsMultiplier_Player[1].description: Scales Stamina gained per level for players. Default: 1.0

PerLevelStatsMultiplier_Player[2].label: PerLevelStatsMultiplier_Player[Torpidity]
PerLevelStatsMultiplier_Player[2].description: Scales Torpidity gained per level for players. Default: 1.0

PerLevelStatsMultiplier_Player[3].label: PerLevelStatsMultiplier_Player[Oxygen]
PerLevelStatsMultiplier_Player[3].description: Scales Oxygen gained per level for players. Default: 1.0

PerLevelStatsMultiplier_Player[4].label: PerLevelStatsMultiplier_Player[Food]
PerLevelStatsMultiplier_Player[4].description: Scales Food gained per level for players. Default: 1.0

PerLevelStatsMultiplier_Player[7].label: PerLevelStatsMultiplier_Player[Weight]
PerLevelStatsMultiplier_Player[7].description: Scales Weight gained per level for players. Default: 1.0

PerLevelStatsMultiplier_Player[8].label: PerLevelStatsMultiplier_Player[Damage]
PerLevelStatsMultiplier_Player[8].description: Scales Damage gained per level for players. Default: 1.0

PerLevelStatsMultiplier_Player[9].label: PerLevelStatsMultiplier_Player[Speed]
PerLevelStatsMultiplier_Player[9].description: Scales Speed gained per level for players. Default: 1.0

PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoTamed[0].label: PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoTamed[Health]
PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoTamed[0].description: Scales Health gained per level for tamed creatures. Default: 0.2

PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoTamed_Add[0].label: PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoTamed_Add[Health]
PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoTamed_Add[0].description: Scales Health immediately added for tamed creatures. Default: 0.14

PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoTamed_Affini.label: PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoTamed_Affinity[Health]
PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoTamed_Affini.description: Scales Health gained per level for tamed creatures based on affinity. Default: 0.44

PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoTamed[1].label: PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoTamed[Stamina]
PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoTamed[1].description: Scales Stamina gained per level for tamed creatures. Default: 1.0

PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoTamed_Add[1].label: PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoTamed_Add[Stamina]
PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoTamed_Add[1].description: Scales Stamina immediately added for tamed creatures. Default: 1.0

PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoTamed_Affini.label: PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoTamed_Affinity[Stamina]
PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoTamed_Affini.description: Scales Stamina gained per level for tamed creatures based on affinity. Default: 1.0

PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoTamed[2].label: PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoTamed[Torpidity]
PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoTamed[2].description: Scales Torpidity gained per level for tamed creatures. Default: 1.0

PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoTamed_Add[2].label: PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoTamed_Add[Torpidity]
PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoTamed_Add[2].description: Scales Torpidity immediately added for tamed creatures. Default: 1.0

PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoTamed_Affini.label: PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoTamed_Affinity[Torpidity]
PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoTamed_Affini.description: Scales Torpidity gained per level for tamed creatures based on affinity. Default: 1.0

PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoTamed[3].label: PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoTamed[Oxygen]
PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoTamed[3].description: Scales Oxygen gained per level for tamed creatures. Default: 1.0

PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoTamed_Add[3].label: PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoTamed_Add[Oxygen]
PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoTamed_Add[3].description: Scales Oxygen immediately added for tamed creatures. Default: 1.0

PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoTamed_Affini.label: PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoTamed_Affinity[Oxygen]
PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoTamed_Affini.description: Scales Oxygen gained per level for tamed creatures based on affinity. Default: 1.0

PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoTamed[4].label: PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoTamed[Food]
PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoTamed[4].description: Scales Food gained per level for tamed creatures. Default: 1.0

PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoTamed_Add[4].label: PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoTamed_Add[Food]
PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoTamed_Add[4].description: Scales Food immediately added for tamed creatures. Default: 1.0

PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoTamed_Affini.label: PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoTamed_Affinity[Food]
PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoTamed_Affini.description: Scales Food gained per level for tamed creatures based on affinity. Default: 1.0

PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoTamed[7].label: PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoTamed[Weight]
PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoTamed[7].description: Scales Weight gained per level for tamed creatures. Default: 1.0

PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoTamed_Add[7].label: PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoTamed_Add[Weight]
PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoTamed_Add[7].description: Scales Weight immediately added for tamed creatures. Default: 1.0

PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoTamed_Affini.label: PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoTamed_Affinity[Weight]
PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoTamed_Affini.description: Scales Weight gained per level for tamed creatures based on affinity. Default: 1.0

PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoTamed[8].label: PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoTamed[Damage]
PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoTamed[8].description: Scales Damage gained per level for tamed creatures. Default: 0.17

PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoTamed_Add[8].label: PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoTamed_Add[Damage]
PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoTamed_Add[8].description: Scales Damage immediately added for tamed creatures. Default: 0.14

PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoTamed_Affini.label: PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoTamed_Affinity[Damage]
PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoTamed_Affini.description: Scales Damage gained per level for tamed creatures based on affinity. Default: 0.44

PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoTamed[9].label: PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoTamed[Speed]
PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoTamed[9].description: Scales Speed gained per level for tamed creatures. Default: 1.0

PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoTamed_Add[9].label: PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoTamed_Add[Speed]
PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoTamed_Add[9].description: Scales Speed immediately added for tamed creatures. Default: 1.0

PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoTamed_Affini.label: PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoTamed_Affinity[Speed]
PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoTamed_Affini.description: Scales Speed gained per level for tamed creatures based on affinity. Default: 1.0

PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoWild[0].label: PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoWild[Health]
PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoWild[0].description: Scales Health gained per level for wild creatures. Default: 1.0

PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoWild[1].label: PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoWild[Stamina]
PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoWild[1].description: Scales Stamina gained per level for wild creatures. Default: 1.0

PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoWild[2].label: PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoWild[Torpidity]
PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoWild[2].description: Scales Torpidity gained per level for wild creatures. Default: 1.0

PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoWild[3].label: PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoWild[Oxygen]
PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoWild[3].description: Scales Oxygen gained per level for wild creatures. Default: 1.0

PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoWild[4].label: PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoWild[Food]
PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoWild[4].description: Scales Food gained per level for wild creatures. Default: 1.0

PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoWild[7].label: PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoWild[Weight]
PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoWild[7].description: Scales Weight gained per level for wild creatures. Default: 1.0

PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoWild[8].label: PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoWild[Damage]
PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoWild[8].description: Scales Damage gained per level for wild creatures. Default: 1.0

PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoWild[9].label: PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoWild[Speed]
PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoWild[9].description: Scales Speed gained per level for wild creatures. Default: 1.0

PhotoModeRangeLimit.label: PhotoModeRangeLimit
PhotoModeRangeLimit.description: Defines the maximum distance between photo mode camera position and player position.

PlayerBaseStatMultipliers[0].label: PlayerBaseStatMultipliers[Health]
PlayerBaseStatMultipliers[0].description: Changes the base Health of a player by multiplying with the default value (100.0). Default: 1.0

PlayerBaseStatMultipliers[1].label: PlayerBaseStatMultipliers[Stamina]
PlayerBaseStatMultipliers[1].description: Changes the base Stamina of a player by multiplying with the default value (100.0). Default: 1.0

PlayerBaseStatMultipliers[2].label: PlayerBaseStatMultipliers[Torpidity]
PlayerBaseStatMultipliers[2].description: Changes the base Torpidity of a player by multiplying with the default value (200.0). Default: 1.0 (Unconscious at 50 regardless of total amount)

PlayerBaseStatMultipliers[3].label: PlayerBaseStatMultipliers[Oxygen]
PlayerBaseStatMultipliers[3].description: Changes the base Oxygen of a player by multiplying with the default value (100.0). Default: 1.0

PlayerBaseStatMultipliers[4].label: PlayerBaseStatMultipliers[Food]
PlayerBaseStatMultipliers[4].description: Changes the base Food of a player by multiplying with the default value (100.0). Default: 1.0

PlayerBaseStatMultipliers[5].label: PlayerBaseStatMultipliers[Water]
PlayerBaseStatMultipliers[5].description: Changes the base Water of a player by multiplying with the default value (100.0). Default: 1.0

PlayerBaseStatMultipliers[7].label: PlayerBaseStatMultipliers[Weight]
PlayerBaseStatMultipliers[7].description: Changes the base Weight of a player by multiplying with the default value (100.0). Default: 1.0

PlayerHarvestingDamageMultiplier.label: PlayerHarvestingDamageMultiplier
PlayerHarvestingDamageMultiplier.description: Scales the damage done to a harvestable item/entity by a Player. A higher value increases it (by percentage): the higher number, the faster the survivors collects.

PoopIntervalMultiplier.label: PoopIntervalMultiplier
PoopIntervalMultiplier.description: Scales how frequently survivors can poop. Higher value decreases it (by percentage)

PreventBreedingForClassNames.label: PreventBreedingForClassNames
PreventBreedingForClassNames.description: Prevents breeding of specific creatures via classname. E.g. PreventBreedingForClassNames="Argent_Character_BP_C". Creature classnames can be found on the Creature IDs page.

PreventDinoTameClassNames.label: PreventDinoTameClassNames
PreventDinoTameClassNames.description: Prevents taming of specific dinosaurs via classname. E.g. PreventDinoTameClassNames="Argent_Character_BP_C". Dino classnames can be found on the Creature IDs page.

PreventOfflinePvPConnectionInvincibleInt.label: PreventOfflinePvPConnectionInvincibleInterval
PreventOfflinePvPConnectionInvincibleInt.description: Specifies the time in seconds a player cannot take damages after logged-in.

PreventTransferForClassNames.label: PreventTransferForClassNames
PreventTransferForClassNames.description: Prevents transfer of specific creatures via classname. E.g. PreventTransferForClassNames="Argent_Character_BP_C"Creature classnames can be found on the Creature IDs page.

PvPZoneStructureDamageMultiplier.label: PvPZoneStructureDamageMultiplier
PvPZoneStructureDamageMultiplier.description: Specifies the scaling factor for damage structures take within caves. The lower the value, the less damage the structure takes (i.e. setting to 1.0 will make structure built in or near a cave receive the same amount of damage as those built on the surface).

ResourceNoReplenishRadiusPlayers.label: ResourceNoReplenishRadiusPlayers
ResourceNoReplenishRadiusPlayers.description: Controls how resources regrow closer or farther away from players. Values higher than 1.0 increase the distance around players where resources are not allowed to grow back. Values between 0 and 1.0 will reduce it.

ResourceNoReplenishRadiusStructures.label: ResourceNoReplenishRadiusStructures
ResourceNoReplenishRadiusStructures.description: Controls how resources regrow closer or farther away from structures Values higher than 1.0 increase the distance around structures where resources are not allowed to grow back. Values between 0 and 1.0 will reduce it.

SpecialXPMultiplier.label: SpecialXPMultiplier
SpecialXPMultiplier.description: Scale the amount of XP earned for SpecialEvent.

StructureDamageRepairCooldown.label: StructureDamageRepairCooldown
StructureDamageRepairCooldown.description: Option for cooldown period on structure repair from the last time damaged. Set to 180 seconds by default, 0 to disable it.

SupplyCrateLootQualityMultiplier.label: SupplyCrateLootQualityMultiplier
SupplyCrateLootQualityMultiplier.description: Increases the quality of items that have a quality in the supply crates. Valid values are from 1.0 to 5.0. The quality also depends on the Difficulty Offset.

TamedDinoCharacterFoodDrainMultiplier.label: TamedDinoCharacterFoodDrainMultiplier
TamedDinoCharacterFoodDrainMultiplier.description: Scales how fast tame creatures consume food.

TamedDinoClassDamageMultipliers.label: TamedDinoClassDamageMultipliers
TamedDinoClassDamageMultipliers.description: Globally overrides tamed creatures damages. See Creature Stats related section for more details.

TamedDinoClassResistanceMultipliers.label: TamedDinoClassResistanceMultipliers
TamedDinoClassResistanceMultipliers.description: Globally overrides tamed creatures resistance. See Creature Stats related section for more details.

TamedDinoTorporDrainMultiplier.label: TamedDinoTorporDrainMultiplier
TamedDinoTorporDrainMultiplier.description: Scales how fast tamed creatures lose torpor.

TribeSlotReuseCooldown.label: TribeSlotReuseCooldown
TribeSlotReuseCooldown.description: Locks a tribe slot for the value in seconds, e.g.: a value of 3600 would mean that if a survivor leaves the tribe, their place cannot be taken by another survivor (or re-join) for 1 hour. Used on Official Small Tribes Servers.

UseCorpseLifeSpanMultiplier.label: UseCorpseLifeSpanMultiplier
UseCorpseLifeSpanMultiplier.description: Modifies corpse and dropped box lifespan.

WildDinoCharacterFoodDrainMultiplier.label: WildDinoCharacterFoodDrainMultiplier
WildDinoCharacterFoodDrainMultiplier.description: Scales how fast wild creatures consume food.

WildDinoTorporDrainMultiplier.label: WildDinoTorporDrainMultiplier
WildDinoTorporDrainMultiplier.description: Scales how fast wild creatures lose torpor.

bHardLimitTurretsInRange.label: bHardLimitTurretsInRange
bHardLimitTurretsInRange.description: If True, enables the retroactive turret hard limit (100 turrets within a 10k unit radius).

bLimitTurretsInRange.label: bLimitTurretsInRange
bLimitTurretsInRange.description: If False, doesn't limit the maximum allowed automated turrets (including Plant Species X) in a certain range.

LimitTurretsNum.label: LimitTurretsNum
LimitTurretsNum.description: Determines the maximum number of turrets that are allowed in the area.

LimitTurretsRange.label: LimitTurretsRange
LimitTurretsRange.description: Determines the area in Unreal Unit in which turrets are added towards the limit.

AdjustableMutagenSpawnDelayMultiplier.label: AdjustableMutagenSpawnDelayMultiplier
AdjustableMutagenSpawnDelayMultiplier.description: Scales the Mutagen spawn rates. By default, The game attempts to spawn them every 8 hours on dedicated servers, and every hour on non-dedicated servers and single-player. Rising this value will rise the re-spawn interval, lowering will make it shorter.

BaseHexagonRewardMultiplier.label: BaseHexagonRewardMultiplier
BaseHexagonRewardMultiplier.description: Scales the missions score hexagon rewards. Also scales token rewards in Club Ark (ASA).

bDisableHexagonStore.label: bDisableHexagonStore
bDisableHexagonStore.description: If True, disables the Hexagon store

bDisableDefaultMapItemSets.label: bDisableDefaultMapItemSets
bDisableDefaultMapItemSets.description: If True, disables Genesis 2 Tek Suit on Spawn.

bDisableGenesisMissions.label: bDisableGenesisMissions
bDisableGenesisMissions.description: If True, disables missions on Genesis.

bDisableWorldBuffs.label: bDisableWorldBuffs
bDisableWorldBuffs.description: If True, disables world effects from Missions (Genesis: Part 2) altogether. To disable specific world buffs, see DisableWorldBuffs of #DynamicConfig.

bEnableWorldBuffScaling.label: bEnableWorldBuffScaling
bEnableWorldBuffScaling.description: If True, makes world effects from Missions (Genesis: Part 2) scale from server settings, rather than add/subtract a flat amount to the value at runtime.

bGenesisUseStructuresPreventionVolumes.label: bGenesisUseStructuresPreventionVolumes
bGenesisUseStructuresPreventionVolumes.description: If True, disables building in mission areas on Genesis: Part 1.

bHexStoreAllowOnlyEngramTradeOption.label: bHexStoreAllowOnlyEngramTradeOption
bHexStoreAllowOnlyEngramTradeOption.description: If True, allows only Engrams to be sold on the Hex Store, disables everything else.

HexagonCostMultiplier.label: HexagonCostMultiplier
HexagonCostMultiplier.description: Scales the hexagon cost of items in the Hexagon store. Also scales token cost of items in Club Ark (ASA).

MutagenLevelBoost[0].label: MutagenLevelBoost[Health]
MutagenLevelBoost[0].description: Number of levels Mutagen adds to Health for wild ancestry tames. Default: 5

MutagenLevelBoost[1].label: MutagenLevelBoost[Stamina]
MutagenLevelBoost[1].description: Number of levels Mutagen adds to Stamina for wild ancestry tames. Default: 5

MutagenLevelBoost[2].label: MutagenLevelBoost[Torpidity]
MutagenLevelBoost[2].description: Number of levels Mutagen adds to Torpidity for wild ancestry tames. Default: 0

MutagenLevelBoost[3].label: MutagenLevelBoost[Oxygen]
MutagenLevelBoost[3].description: Number of levels Mutagen adds to Oxygen for wild ancestry tames. Default: 0

MutagenLevelBoost[4].label: MutagenLevelBoost[Food]
MutagenLevelBoost[4].description: Number of levels Mutagen adds to Food for wild ancestry tames. Default: 0

MutagenLevelBoost[5].label: MutagenLevelBoost[Water]
MutagenLevelBoost[5].description: Number of levels Mutagen adds to Water for wild ancestry tames. Default: 0

MutagenLevelBoost[6].label: MutagenLevelBoost[Temperature]
MutagenLevelBoost[6].description: Number of levels Mutagen adds to Temperature for wild ancestry tames. Default: 0

MutagenLevelBoost[7].label: MutagenLevelBoost[Weight]
MutagenLevelBoost[7].description: Number of levels Mutagen adds to Weight for wild ancestry tames. Default: 5

MutagenLevelBoost[8].label: MutagenLevelBoost[MeleeDamage]
MutagenLevelBoost[8].description: Number of levels Mutagen adds to Melee Damage for wild ancestry tames. Default: 5

MutagenLevelBoost[9].label: MutagenLevelBoost[Speed]
MutagenLevelBoost[9].description: Number of levels Mutagen adds to Movement Speed for wild ancestry tames. Default: 0

MutagenLevelBoost[10].label: MutagenLevelBoost[Fortitude]
MutagenLevelBoost[10].description: Number of levels Mutagen adds to Fortitude for wild ancestry tames. Default: 0

MutagenLevelBoost[11].label: MutagenLevelBoost[CraftingSpeed]
MutagenLevelBoost[11].description: Number of levels Mutagen adds to Crafting Speed for wild ancestry tames. Default: 0

MutagenLevelBoost_Bred[0].label: MutagenLevelBoost_Bred[Health]
MutagenLevelBoost_Bred[0].description: Number of levels Mutagen adds to Health for bred tames. Default: 1

MutagenLevelBoost_Bred[1].label: MutagenLevelBoost_Bred[Stamina]
MutagenLevelBoost_Bred[1].description: Number of levels Mutagen adds to Stamina for bred tames. Default: 1

MutagenLevelBoost_Bred[2].label: MutagenLevelBoost_Bred[Torpidity]
MutagenLevelBoost_Bred[2].description: Number of levels Mutagen adds to Torpidity for bred tames. Default: 0

MutagenLevelBoost_Bred[3].label: MutagenLevelBoost_Bred[Oxygen]
MutagenLevelBoost_Bred[3].description: Number of levels Mutagen adds to Oxygen for bred tames. Default: 0

MutagenLevelBoost_Bred[4].label: MutagenLevelBoost_Bred[Food]
MutagenLevelBoost_Bred[4].description: Number of levels Mutagen adds to Food for bred tames. Default: 0

MutagenLevelBoost_Bred[5].label: MutagenLevelBoost_Bred[Water]
MutagenLevelBoost_Bred[5].description: Number of levels Mutagen adds to Water for bred tames. Default: 0

MutagenLevelBoost_Bred[6].label: MutagenLevelBoost_Bred[Temperature]
MutagenLevelBoost_Bred[6].description: Number of levels Mutagen adds to Temperature for bred tames. Default: 0

MutagenLevelBoost_Bred[7].label: MutagenLevelBoost_Bred[Weight]
MutagenLevelBoost_Bred[7].description: Number of levels Mutagen adds to Weight for bred tames. Default: 1

MutagenLevelBoost_Bred[8].label: MutagenLevelBoost_Bred[MeleeDamage]
MutagenLevelBoost_Bred[8].description: Number of levels Mutagen adds to Melee Damage for bred tames. Default: 1

MutagenLevelBoost_Bred[9].label: MutagenLevelBoost_Bred[Speed]
MutagenLevelBoost_Bred[9].description: Number of levels Mutagen adds to Movement Speed for bred tames. Default: 0

MutagenLevelBoost_Bred[10].label: MutagenLevelBoost_Bred[Fortitude]
MutagenLevelBoost_Bred[10].description: Number of levels Mutagen adds to Fortitude for bred tames. Default: 0

MutagenLevelBoost_Bred[11].label: MutagenLevelBoost_Bred[CraftingSpeed]
MutagenLevelBoost_Bred[11].description: Number of levels Mutagen adds to Crafting Speed for bred tames. Default: 0

WorldBuffScalingEfficacy.label: WorldBuffScalingEfficacy
WorldBuffScalingEfficacy.description: Makes world effects from Missions (Genesis: Part 2) scaling more or less effective when setting bEnableWorldBuffScaling=True. 1 would be default, 0.5 would be 50% less effective, 100 would be 100x more effective.

ServerAdminPassword.label: Admin Password
ServerAdminPassword.description: If specified, players must provide this password (via the in-game console) to gain access to administrator commands on the server. Note: no quotes are used.

SessionName.label: Session Name
SessionName.description: Specifies the Server name advertised in the Game Server Browser as well in Steam Server browser. If no name is provide, the default name will be ARK # followed by a random 6 digit number. Note: Name must not be typed between quotes unless it is launched from command line.

ActiveMods.label: ActiveMods
ActiveMods.description: Value type: list of mod IDs, comma-separated with no spaces, in a single line (for example: ModID1,ModID2,ModID3)Specifies the order and which mods are loaded. ModIDs are comma separated and in one line. Priority is in descending order (the left-most ModID hast the highest priority). Alternatively, but not suggested, the command line ?GameModIds= can be used.

ActiveMapMod.label: ActiveMapMod
ActiveMapMod.description: Value type: mod ID for currently active mod mapSpecifies which mod map is loaded.

ActiveTotalConversion.label: ActiveTotalConversion
ActiveTotalConversion.description: Value type: ModIDUsed to specify a total conversion mod (e.g.: Primitive Plus). Alternatively, the command line option -TotalConversionMod=<ModID> can also be set.

Port.label: Game Port
Port.description: Specifies the UDP Game Port. Peer port is this + 1. See Dedicated server setup

QueryPort.label: Steam Query Port
QueryPort.description: Specifies the UDP Steam Query Port. See Dedicated server setup

ServerPassword.label: Server Password
ServerPassword.description: If specified, players must provide this password to join the server. Note: no quotes are used.

serverPVE.label: Server PVE Mode
serverPVE.description: If True, disables PvP and enables PvE

ServerHardcore.label: Hardcore Mode
ServerHardcore.description: If True, enables Hardcore mode (player characters revert to level 1 upon death)

RCONEnabled.label: Enable RCON
RCONEnabled.description: If True, enables RCON, needs RCONPort=<TCP_PORT> and ServerAdminPassword=<admin_password> to work.

RCONPort.label: RCON Port
RCONPort.description: Specifies the optional TCP RCON Port. See Dedicated server setup

AllowThirdPersonPlayer.label: Allow Third Person
AllowThirdPersonPlayer.description: If False, disables third person camera allowed by default on all dedicated servers.

ServerCrosshair.label: Enable Crosshair
ServerCrosshair.description: If False, disables the Crosshair on your server.

ServerForceNoHUD.label: Force No HUD
ServerForceNoHUD.description: If True, HUD is always disabled for non-tribe owned NPCs.

bAllowFlyerCarryPvE.label: Allow Flyer Carry (PvE)
bAllowFlyerCarryPvE.description: If True, allows flying creatures to pick up wild creatures in PvE.

XPMultiplier.label: XP Multiplier
XPMultiplier.description: Specifies the scaling factor for the experience received by players, tribes and tames for various actions. The default value 1 provides the same amounts of experience as in the single player experience (and official public servers). Higher values increase XP amounts awarded for various actions; lower values decrease it. In 313.5 an additional hardcoded multiplier of 4 was activated.

TamingSpeedMultiplier.label: Taming Speed Multiplier
TamingSpeedMultiplier.description: Specifies the scaling factor for creature taming speed. Higher values make taming faster.

AdminLogging.label: AdminLogging
AdminLogging.description: Value type: booleanIf True, logs all admin commands to in-game chat.

AllowAnyoneBabyImprintCuddle.label: AllowAnyoneBabyImprintCuddle
AllowAnyoneBabyImprintCuddle.description: Value type: booleanIf True, allows anyone to "take care" of a baby creatures (cuddle etc.), not just whomever imprinted on it.

AllowCaveBuildingPvE.label: AllowCaveBuildingPvE
AllowCaveBuildingPvE.description: Value type: booleanIf True, allows building in caves when PvE mode is also enabled. Note: no more working in command-line options before patch 241.5.

AllowCaveBuildingPvP.label: AllowCaveBuildingPvP
AllowCaveBuildingPvP.description: Value type: booleanIf False, prevents building in caves when PvP mode is also enabled.

AllowCrateSpawnsOnTopOfStructures.label: AllowCrateSpawnsOnTopOfStructures
AllowCrateSpawnsOnTopOfStructures.description: Value type: booleanIf True, allows from-the-air Supply Crates to appear on top of Structures, rather than being prevented by Structures.

AllowCryoFridgeOnSaddle.label: AllowCryoFridgeOnSaddle
AllowCryoFridgeOnSaddle.description: Value type: booleanIf True, allows cryofridges to be built on platform saddles and rafts.

AllowFlyerCarryPvE.label: AllowFlyerCarryPvE
AllowFlyerCarryPvE.description: Value type: booleanIf True, allows flying creatures to pick up wild creatures in PvE.

AllowFlyingStaminaRecovery.label: AllowFlyingStaminaRecovery
AllowFlyingStaminaRecovery.description: Value type: booleanIf True, allows server to recover Stamina when standing on a Flyer.

AllowHideDamageSourceFromLogs.label: AllowHideDamageSourceFromLogs
AllowHideDamageSourceFromLogs.description: Value type: booleanIf False, shows the damage sources in tribe logs.

AllowHitMarkers.label: AllowHitMarkers
AllowHitMarkers.description: Value type: booleanIf False, disables optional markers for ranged attacks.

AllowIntegratedSPlusStructures.label: AllowIntegratedSPlusStructures
AllowIntegratedSPlusStructures.description: Value type: booleanif False, disables all of the new S+ structures (intended mainly for letting unofficial servers that want to keep using the S+ mod version to keep using that without a ton of extra duplicate structures).

AllowMultipleAttachedC4.label: AllowMultipleAttachedC4
AllowMultipleAttachedC4.description: Value type: booleanIf True, allows to attach more than one C4 per creature.

AllowRaidDinoFeeding.label: AllowRaidDinoFeeding
AllowRaidDinoFeeding.description: Value type: booleanIf True, allows Titanosaurs to be permanently tamed (namely allow them to be fed). Note: in The Island only spawns a maximum of 3 Titanosaurs, so 3 tamed ones should ultimately block any more ones from spawning.

AllowSharedConnections.label: AllowSharedConnections
AllowSharedConnections.description: Value type: booleanIf True, allows family sharing players to connect to the server.

AllowTekSuitPowersInGenesis.label: AllowTekSuitPowersInGenesis
AllowTekSuitPowersInGenesis.description: Value type: booleanIf True, enables TEK suit powers in Genesis: Part 1.

AlwaysAllowStructurePickup.label: AlwaysAllowStructurePickup
AlwaysAllowStructurePickup.description: Value type: booleanIf True disables the timer on the quick pick-up system.

AlwaysNotifyPlayerLeft.label: AlwaysNotifyPlayerLeft
AlwaysNotifyPlayerLeft.description: Value type: booleanIf True, players will always get notified if someone leaves the server

AutoDestroyDecayedDinos.label: AutoDestroyDecayedDinos
AutoDestroyDecayedDinos.description: Value type: booleanIf True, auto-destroys claimable decayed tames on load, rather than have them remain around as claimable. Note: after patch 273.691, in PvE mode the tame auto-unclaim after decay period has been disabled in official PvE.

AutoDestroyOldStructuresMultiplier.label: AutoDestroyOldStructuresMultiplier
AutoDestroyOldStructuresMultiplier.description: Value type: floatAllows auto-destruction of structures only after sufficient "no nearby tribe" time has passed (defined as a multiplier of the Allow Claim period). To enable it, set it to 1.0. Useful for servers to clear off abandoned structures automatically over time. Requires -AutoDestroyStructures command line option to work. The value scales with each structure decay time.

AutoSavePeriodMinutes.label: AutoSavePeriodMinutes
AutoSavePeriodMinutes.description: Value type: floatSet interval for automatic saves. Setting this to 0 will cause constant saving.

BanListURL.label: BanListURL
BanListURL.description: Value type: string with a URLSets the global ban list. Must be enclosed in double quotes. The list is fetched every 10 minutes (to check if there are new banned IDs).ARK: Survival Evolved: Official ban list URL is http://arkdedicated.com/banlist.txt (before 279.233 the URL was http://playark.com/banlist.txt). Note: it supports the HTTP protocol only (HTTPS is not supported).ARK: Survival Evolved: Official ban list URL is https://cdn2.arkdedicated.com/asa/BanList.txt. Note: it supports both HTTP and HTTPS protocols.

bForceCanRideFliers.label: bForceCanRideFliers
bForceCanRideFliers.description: Value type: booleanIf True, allows flyers to be used on maps where they normally are disabled. Note: if you set it to False it will disable flyers on any map.

ClampItemSpoilingTimes.label: ClampItemSpoilingTimes
ClampItemSpoilingTimes.description: Value type: booleanIf True, clamps all spoiling times to the items' maximum spoiling times. Useful if any infinite-spoiling exploits were used on the server and you wish to clean them up. Could potentially cause issues with mods that alter spoiling time, hence it is an option.

ClampItemStats.label: ClampItemStats
ClampItemStats.description: Value type: booleanIf True, enables stats clamping for items. See ItemStatClamps for more info.

ClampResourceHarvestDamage.label: ClampResourceHarvestDamage
ClampResourceHarvestDamage.description: Value type: booleanIf True, limit the damage caused by a tame to a resource on harvesting based on resource remaining health. Note: enabling this setting may result in sensible resource harvesting reduction using high damage tools or creatures.

CosmeticWhitelistOverride.label: CosmeticWhitelistOverride
CosmeticWhitelistOverride.description: Value type: string with a URLURL to a comma-separated list of whitelisted custom cosmetics, in this format: Mod ID|Enable Dynamic Download (0/1)|Allow non-dataonly blueprints(0/1)|Calculated package CRC. See this post for details.

CustomDynamicConfigUrl.label: CustomDynamicConfigUrl
CustomDynamicConfigUrl.description: Value type: string with a URLDirect link to a live dynamicconfig.ini file (http://arkdedicated.com/dynamicconfig.ini), allowing live changes of the supported options without the need of server restart, as well defining custom colour set for wild creatures' spawns. Note: requires -UseDynamicConfig command line option, string with a URL must use the HTTP protocol (HTTPS is not supported) and inside quotes if used in command line. Check the DynamicConfig section for the supported settings.

CustomLiveTuningUrl.label: CustomLiveTuningUrl
CustomLiveTuningUrl.description: Value type: string with a URLDirect link to the live tuning file. For more information on how to use this system check out the official announcement: https://survivetheark.com/index.php?/forums/topic/569366-server-configuration-live-tuning-system.ARK: Survival Evolved: official servers use http://arkdedicated.com/DefaultOverloads.json. Note: string with a URL must use the HTTP protocol (HTTPS is not supported) and inside quotes if used in command line.ARK: Survival Ascended: official servers use https://cdn2.arkdedicated.com/asa/livetuningoverloads.json. Note: string with a URL must use inside quotes if used in command line.

DayCycleSpeedScale.label: DayCycleSpeedScale
DayCycleSpeedScale.description: Specifies the scaling factor for the passage of time in the ARK, controlling how often day changes to night and night changes to day. The default value 1 provides the same cycle speed as the single player experience (and the official public servers). Values lower than 1 slow down the cycle; higher values accelerate it. Base time when value is 1 appears to be 1-minute real time equals approx. 28-minutes game time. Thus, for an approximate 24-hour day/night cycle in game, use .035 for the value.

DayTimeSpeedScale.label: DayTimeSpeedScale
DayTimeSpeedScale.description: Specifies the scaling factor for the passage of time in the ARK during the day. This value determines the length of each day, relative to the length of each night (as specified by NightTimeSpeedScale). Lowering this value increases the length of each day.

DestroyUnconnectedWaterPipes.label: DestroyUnconnectedWaterPipes
DestroyUnconnectedWaterPipes.description: Value type: booleanIf True, after two days real-time the pipes will auto-destroy if unconnected to any non-pipe (directly or indirectly) and no allied player is nearby.

DinoCharacterFoodDrainMultiplier.label: DinoCharacterFoodDrainMultiplier
DinoCharacterFoodDrainMultiplier.description: Specifies the scaling factor for creatures' food consumption. Higher values increase food consumption (creatures get hungry faster). It also affects the taming-times.

DinoCharacterHealthRecoveryMultiplier.label: DinoCharacterHealthRecoveryMultiplier
DinoCharacterHealthRecoveryMultiplier.description: Specifies the scaling factor for creatures' health recovery. Higher values increase the recovery rate (creatures heal faster).

DinoCharacterStaminaDrainMultiplier.label: DinoCharacterStaminaDrainMultiplier
DinoCharacterStaminaDrainMultiplier.description: Specifies the scaling factor for creatures' stamina consumption. Higher values increase stamina consumption (creatures get tired faster).

DinoCountMultiplier.label: DinoCountMultiplier
DinoCountMultiplier.description: Value type: floatSpecifies the scaling factor for creature spawns. Higher values increase the number of creatures spawned throughout the ARK.

DinoDamageMultiplier.label: DinoDamageMultiplier
DinoDamageMultiplier.description: Specifies the scaling factor for the damage wild creatures deal with their attacks. The default value 1 provides normal damage. Higher values increase damage. Lower values decrease it.

DinoResistanceMultiplier.label: DinoResistanceMultiplier
DinoResistanceMultiplier.description: Specifies the scaling factor for the resistance to damage wild creatures receive when attacked. The default value 1 provides normal damage. Higher values decrease resistance, increasing damage per attack. Lower values increase it, reducing damage per attack. A value of 0.5 results in a creature taking half damage while a value of 2.0 would result in a creature taking double normal damage.

DestroyTamesOverTheSoftTameLimit.label: DestroyTamesOverTheSoftTameLimit
DestroyTamesOverTheSoftTameLimit.description: Value type: booleanDinos above the Soft Tame Server Limit will be marked For Cryo and display an icon and a timer indicating how soon they need to be cryopodded before they are automatically destroyed. Dinos marked and dinos destroyed by this system will be logged in the tribe log. This differs from the standard tame limit, as it still allows new players to join servers and tame creatures above the 5000 limit, whereas previously, they would not have been able to tame or breed creatures at the server cap. You can define the soft tame limit with MaxTamedDinos_SoftTameLimit. You can define the time (in seconds) before tame's autodestruction with MaxTamedDinos_SoftTameLimit_CountdownForDeletionDuration.

DisableCryopodEnemyCheck.label: DisableCryopodEnemyCheck
DisableCryopodEnemyCheck.description: Value type: booleanIf True, allows cryopods to be used while enemies are nearby.

DisableCryopodFridgeRequirement.label: DisableCryopodFridgeRequirement
DisableCryopodFridgeRequirement.description: Value type: booleanIf True, allows cryopods to be used without needing to be in range of a powered cryofridge.

DisableDinoDecayPvE.label: DisableDinoDecayPvE
DisableDinoDecayPvE.description: Value type: booleanIf True, disables the creature decay in PvE mode. Note: after patch 273.691, in PvE mode the creature auto-unclaim after decay period has been disabled.

DisableImprintDinoBuff.label: DisableImprintDinoBuff
DisableImprintDinoBuff.description: Value type: booleanIf True, disables the creature imprinting player Stat Bonus. Where whomever specifically imprinted on the creature, and raised it to have an Imprinting Quality, gets extra Damage/Resistance buff.

DisablePvEGamma.label: DisablePvEGamma
DisablePvEGamma.description: Value type: booleanIf True, prevents use of console command "gamma" in PvE mode.

DisableStructureDecayPvE.label: DisableStructureDecayPvE
DisableStructureDecayPvE.description: Value type: booleanIf True, disables the gradual auto-decay of player structures.

DisableWeatherFog.label: DisableWeatherFog
DisableWeatherFog.description: Value type: booleanIf True, disables fog.

DontAlwaysNotifyPlayerJoined.label: DontAlwaysNotifyPlayerJoined
DontAlwaysNotifyPlayerJoined.description: Value type: booleanIf True, globally disables player joins notifications.

EnableExtraStructurePreventionVolumes.label: EnableExtraStructurePreventionVolumes
EnableExtraStructurePreventionVolumes.description: Value type: booleanIf True, disables building in specific resource-rich areas, in particular setup on The Island around the major mountains.

EnablePvPGamma.label: EnablePvPGamma
EnablePvPGamma.description: Value type: booleanIf True, allows use of console command "gamma" in PvP mode.

ExtinctionEventTimeInterval.label: ExtinctionEventTimeInterval
ExtinctionEventTimeInterval.description: Value type: secondsUsed to enable the extinction mode (ARKpocalypse). The number is the time in seconds. Use 2592000 value for 30 days.

FastDecayUnsnappedCoreStructures.label: FastDecayUnsnappedCoreStructures
FastDecayUnsnappedCoreStructures.description: Value type: booleanIf True, unsnapped foundations/pillars/fences/Tek Dedicated Storage will decay after the time stated by FastDecayInterval in Game.ini (default is 12 hours). Before 259.0, it set the decay time for such structures straight to 5 times faster.

ForceAllStructureLocking.label: ForceAllStructureLocking
ForceAllStructureLocking.description: Value type: booleanIf True, will default lock all structures.

globalVoiceChat.label: globalVoiceChat
globalVoiceChat.description: Value type: booleanIf True, voice chat turns global.

HarvestAmountMultiplier.label: HarvestAmountMultiplier
HarvestAmountMultiplier.description: Value type: floatSpecifies the scaling factor for yields from all harvesting activities (chopping down trees, picking berries, carving carcasses, mining rocks, etc.). Higher values increase the amount of materials harvested with each strike.

HarvestHealthMultiplier.label: HarvestHealthMultiplier
HarvestHealthMultiplier.description: Value type: floatSpecifies the scaling factor for the "health" of items that can be harvested (trees, rocks, carcasses, etc.). Higher values increase the amount of damage (i.e., "number of strikes") such objects can withstand before being destroyed, which results in higher overall harvest yields.

IgnoreLimitMaxStructuresInRangeTypeFlag.label: IgnoreLimitMaxStructuresInRangeTypeFlag
IgnoreLimitMaxStructuresInRangeTypeFlag.description: Value type: booleanIf True, removes the limit of 150 decorative structures (flags, signs, dermis etc.).

ImplantSuicideCD.label: ImplantSuicideCD
ImplantSuicideCD.description: Value type: floatDefines the time (in seconds) a player must wait between 2 uses of the implant's "Respawn" feature.

ItemStackSizeMultiplier.label: ItemStackSizeMultiplier
ItemStackSizeMultiplier.description: Value type: floatAllow increasing or decreasing global item stack size, this means all default stack sizes will be multiplied by the value given (excluding items that have a stack size of 1 by default).

KickIdlePlayersPeriod.label: KickIdlePlayersPeriod
KickIdlePlayersPeriod.description: Value type: floatTime in seconds after which characters that have not moved or interacted will be kicked (if -EnableIdlePlayerKick as command line parameter is set). Note: although at code level it is defined as a floating-point number, it is suggested to use an integer instead.

MaxGateFrameOnSaddles.label: MaxGateFrameOnSaddles
MaxGateFrameOnSaddles.description: Value type: integerDefines the maximum amount of gateways allowed on platform saddles. A value of 2 would prevent players from placing more than 2 gateways on their platform saddles (used in Official PvP servers). This setting is not retroactive, meaning existing builds won't be affected. Set to 0 to not allow players to place gateways on platform saddles (used in Official PvE servers).

MaxHexagonsPerCharacter.label: MaxHexagonsPerCharacter
MaxHexagonsPerCharacter.description: Value type: integerSets the max amount of Hexagon a Character can accumulate. Official set it to 2500000.

MaxPersonalTamedDinos.label: MaxPersonalTamedDinos
MaxPersonalTamedDinos.description: Value type: integerSets a per-tribe creature tame limit (500 on official PvE servers, 300 in official PvP servers). The default value of 0 disables such limit.

MaxPlatformSaddleStructureLimit.label: MaxPlatformSaddleStructureLimit
MaxPlatformSaddleStructureLimit.description: Value type: integerChanges the maximum number of platformed-creatures/rafts allowed on the ARK (a potential performance cost). Example: MaxPlatformSaddleStructureLimit=10 would only allow 10 platform saddles/rafts across the entire ARK.

PlatformSaddleBuildAreaBoundsMultiplier.label: Platform Saddle Build Area Bounds Multiplier
PlatformSaddleBuildAreaBoundsMultiplier.description: Increasing the number allows structures being placed further away from the platform.

MaxTamedDinos.label: MaxTamedDinos
MaxTamedDinos.description: Value type: floatSets the maximum number of tame creatures on a server, this is a global cap. Note: although at code level it is defined as a floating-point number, it is suggested to use an integer instead.

MaxTamedDinos_SoftTameLimit.label: MaxTamedDinos_SoftTameLimit
MaxTamedDinos_SoftTameLimit.description: Value type: integerDefines the server-wide soft tame limit. See DestroyTamesOverTheSoftTameLimit for more info.

MaxTamedDinos_SoftTameLimit_CountdownFor.label: MaxTamedDinos_SoftTameLimit_CountdownForDeletionDuration
MaxTamedDinos_SoftTameLimit_CountdownFor.description: Value type: integerDefines the time (in seconds) for tame to get destroyed. See DestroyTamesOverTheSoftTameLimit for more info.

MaxTrainCars.label: MaxTrainCars
MaxTrainCars.description: Value type: integerDefines the maximum amount of carts a train cave have.

MaxTributeCharacters.label: MaxTributeCharacters
MaxTributeCharacters.description: Value type: integerSlots for uploaded characters. Any value less than default will be reverted. Note: rising it may corrupt player/cluster data and lead to lose of all stored characters.

MaxTributeDinos.label: MaxTributeDinos
MaxTributeDinos.description: Value type: integerSlots for uploaded creatures. Any value less than default will be reverted. Note: Some player claimed maximum 273 to be safe cap and more will corrupt profile/cluster and lead to lose of all stored creatures but it need to be checked

MaxTributeItems.label: MaxTributeItems
MaxTributeItems.description: Value type: integerSlots for uploaded items and resources. Any value less than default will be reverted. Note: Some player claimed maximum 154 to be safe cap and more will corrupt profile/cluster and lead to lose of all stored items and resources but it need to be checked

NightTimeSpeedScale.label: NightTimeSpeedScale
NightTimeSpeedScale.description: Value type: floatSpecifies the scaling factor for the passage of time in the ARK during night time. This value determines the length of each night, relative to the length of each day (as specified by DayTimeSpeedScale) Lowering this value increases the length of each night.

NonPermanentDiseases.label: NonPermanentDiseases
NonPermanentDiseases.description: Value type: booleanIf True, makes permanent diseases not permanent. Players will lose them if on re-spawn.

NPCNetworkStasisRangeScalePlayerCountSta.label: NPCNetworkStasisRangeScalePlayerCountStart
NPCNetworkStasisRangeScalePlayerCountSta.description: Value type: integerMinimum number of online players when the NPC Network Stasis Range Scale override is enabled (requires inputting into INI, not command line). Used to override the NPC Network Stasis Range Scale (to scale server performance for more player), on default is set to 0, disabling it. Official set it to 24.

NPCNetworkStasisRangeScalePlayerCountEnd.label: NPCNetworkStasisRangeScalePlayerCountEnd
NPCNetworkStasisRangeScalePlayerCountEnd.description: Value type: integerMaximum number of online players when NPCNetworkStasisRangeScalePercentEnd is reached (requires inputting into INI, not command line). Used to override the NPC Network Stasis Range Scale (to scale server performance for more player), on default is set to 0, disabling it. Official set it to 70

NPCNetworkStasisRangeScalePercentEnd.label: NPCNetworkStasisRangeScalePercentEnd
NPCNetworkStasisRangeScalePercentEnd.description: Value type: floatThe Maximum scale percentage used when NPCNetworkStasisRangeScalePlayerCountEnd is reached (requires inputting into INI, not command line). Used to override the NPC Network Stasis Range Scale (to scale server performance for more player). Official set it to 0.5.

OnlyAutoDestroyCoreStructures.label: OnlyAutoDestroyCoreStructures
OnlyAutoDestroyCoreStructures.description: Value type: booleanIf True, prevents any non-core/non-foundation structures from auto-destroying (however they'll still get auto-destroyed if a floor that they're on gets auto-destroyed). Official PvE Servers used this option.

OnlyDecayUnsnappedCoreStructures.label: OnlyDecayUnsnappedCoreStructures
OnlyDecayUnsnappedCoreStructures.description: Value type: booleanIf True, only unsnapped core structures will decay. Useful for eliminating lone pillar/foundation spam.

OverrideOfficialDifficulty.label: OverrideOfficialDifficulty
OverrideOfficialDifficulty.description: Value type: floatAllows you to override the default server difficulty level of 4 with 5 to match the new official server difficulty level. Default value of 0.0 disables the override. A value of 5.0 will allow common creatures to spawn up to level 150. Originally (247.95) available only as command line option.

OverrideStructurePlatformPrevention.label: OverrideStructurePlatformPrevention
OverrideStructurePlatformPrevention.description: Value type: booleanIf True, turrets becomes be buildable and functional on platform saddles. Since 247.999 applies on spike structure too. Note: despite patch notes, in ShooterGameServer it's coded OverrideStructurePlatformPrevention with two r.

OxygenSwimSpeedStatMultiplier.label: OxygenSwimSpeedStatMultiplier
OxygenSwimSpeedStatMultiplier.description: Value type: floatUse this to set how swim speed is multiplied by level spent in oxygen. The value was reduced by 80% in 256.0.

PerPlatformMaxStructuresMultiplier.label: PerPlatformMaxStructuresMultiplier
PerPlatformMaxStructuresMultiplier.description: Value type: floatHigher value increases (from a percentage scale) max number of items place-able on saddles and rafts.

PersonalTamedDinosSaddleStructureCost.label: PersonalTamedDinosSaddleStructureCost
PersonalTamedDinosSaddleStructureCost.description: Value type: integerDetermines the amount of "tame creature slots" a platform saddle (with structures) will use towards the tribe tame creature limit.

PlayerCharacterFoodDrainMultiplier.label: PlayerCharacterFoodDrainMultiplier
PlayerCharacterFoodDrainMultiplier.description: Value type: floatSpecifies the scaling factor for player characters' food consumption. Higher values increase food consumption (player characters get hungry faster).

PlayerCharacterHealthRecoveryMultiplier.label: PlayerCharacterHealthRecoveryMultiplier
PlayerCharacterHealthRecoveryMultiplier.description: Value type: floatSpecifies the scaling factor for player characters' health recovery. Higher values increase the recovery rate (player characters heal faster).

PlayerCharacterStaminaDrainMultiplier.label: PlayerCharacterStaminaDrainMultiplier
PlayerCharacterStaminaDrainMultiplier.description: Value type: floatSpecifies the scaling factor for player characters' stamina consumption. Higher values increase stamina consumption (player characters get tired faster).

PlayerCharacterWaterDrainMultiplier.label: PlayerCharacterWaterDrainMultiplier
PlayerCharacterWaterDrainMultiplier.description: Value type: floatSpecifies the scaling factor for player characters' water consumption. Higher values increase water consumption (player characters get thirsty faster).

PlayerDamageMultiplier.label: PlayerDamageMultiplier
PlayerDamageMultiplier.description: Value type: floatSpecifies the scaling factor for the damage players deal with their attacks. The default value 1 provides normal damage. Higher values increase damage. Lower values decrease it.

PlayerResistanceMultiplier.label: PlayerResistanceMultiplier
PlayerResistanceMultiplier.description: Value type: floatSpecifies the scaling factor for the resistance to damage players receive when attacked. The default value 1 provides normal damage. Higher values decrease resistance, increasing damage per attack. Lower values increase it, reducing damage per attack. A value of 0.5 results in a player taking half damage while a value of 2.0 would result in taking double normal damage.

PreventDiseases.label: PreventDiseases
PreventDiseases.description: Value type: booleanIf True, completely diseases on the server. Thus far just Swamp Fever.

PreventMateBoost.label: PreventMateBoost
PreventMateBoost.description: Value type: booleanIf True, disables creature mate boosting.

PreventOfflinePvP.label: PreventOfflinePvP
PreventOfflinePvP.description: Value type: booleanIf True, enables the Offline Raiding Prevention (ORP). When all tribe members are logged off, tribe characters, creature and structures become invulnerable. Creature starvation still applies, moreover, characters and creature can still die if drowned. Despite the name, it works on both PvE and PvP game modes. Due to performance reason, it is recommended to set a minimum interval with PreventOfflinePvPInterval option before ORP becomes active. ORP also helps lowering memory and CPU usage on a server. Enabled by default on Official PvE since 258.3

PreventOfflinePvPInterval.label: PreventOfflinePvPInterval
PreventOfflinePvPInterval.description: Value type: floatSeconds to wait before a ORP becomes active for tribe/players and relative creatures/structures (10 seconds in official PvE servers). Note: although at code level it is defined as a floating-point number, it is suggested to use an integer instead.

PreventSpawnAnimations.label: PreventSpawnAnimations
PreventSpawnAnimations.description: Value type: booleanIf True, player characters (re)spawn without the wake-up animation.

PreventTribeAlliances.label: PreventTribeAlliances
PreventTribeAlliances.description: Value type: booleanIf True, prevents tribes from creating Alliances.

ProximityChat.label: ProximityChat
ProximityChat.description: Value type: booleanIf True, only players near each other can see their chat messages

PvEAllowStructuresAtSupplyDrops.label: PvEAllowStructuresAtSupplyDrops
PvEAllowStructuresAtSupplyDrops.description: Value type: booleanIf True, allows building near supply drop points in PvE mode.

PvEDinoDecayPeriodMultiplier.label: PvEDinoDecayPeriodMultiplier
PvEDinoDecayPeriodMultiplier.description: Value type: floatCreature PvE auto-decay time multiplier. Requires DisableDinoDecayPvE=false in GameUserSettings.ini or ?DisableDinoDecayPvE=false in command line to work.

PvEStructureDecayPeriodMultiplier.label: PvEStructureDecayPeriodMultiplier
PvEStructureDecayPeriodMultiplier.description: Value type: floatSpecifies the scaling factor for  structures decay times, e.g.: setting it at 2.0 will double all structure decay times, while setting at 0.5 will halve the timers. Note: despite the name, works in both PvP and PvE modes when structure decay is enabled.

PvPDinoDecay.label: PvPDinoDecay
PvPDinoDecay.description: Value type: booleanIf True, enables creatures' decay in PvP while the Offline Raid Prevention is active.

PvPStructureDecay.label: PvPStructureDecay
PvPStructureDecay.description: Value type: booleanIf True, enables structures decay on PvP servers while the Offline Raid Prevention is active.

RaidDinoCharacterFoodDrainMultiplier.label: RaidDinoCharacterFoodDrainMultiplier
RaidDinoCharacterFoodDrainMultiplier.description: Value type: floatAffects how quickly the food drains on such "raid dinos" (e.g.: Titanosaurus)

RandomSupplyCratePoints.label: RandomSupplyCratePoints
RandomSupplyCratePoints.description: Value type: booleanIf True, supply drops are in random locations. Note: This setting is known to cause artifacts becoming inaccessible on Ragnarok if active.

RCONServerGameLogBuffer.label: RCONServerGameLogBuffer
RCONServerGameLogBuffer.description: Value type: floatDetermines how many lines of game logs are send over the RCON. Note: despite being coded as a float it's suggested to treat it as integer.

ResourcesRespawnPeriodMultiplier.label: ResourcesRespawnPeriodMultiplier
ResourcesRespawnPeriodMultiplier.description: Value type: floatSpecifies the scaling factor for the re-spawn rate for resource nodes (trees, rocks, bushes, etc.). Lower values cause nodes to re-spawn more frequently.

ServerAutoForceRespawnWildDinosInterval.label: ServerAutoForceRespawnWildDinosInterval
ServerAutoForceRespawnWildDinosInterval.description: Value type: floatForce re-spawn of all wild creatures on server restart afters the value set in seconds. Default value of 0.0 disables it. Useful to prevent certain creature species (like the Basilo and Spino) from becoming depopulated on long running servers.

ShowFloatingDamageText.label: ShowFloatingDamageText
ShowFloatingDamageText.description: Value type: booleanIf True, enables RPG-style popup damage text mode.

ShowMapPlayerLocation.label: ShowMapPlayerLocation
ShowMapPlayerLocation.description: Value type: booleanIf False, hides each player their own precise position when they view their map.

SpectatorPassword.label: SpectatorPassword
SpectatorPassword.description: Value type: stringTo use non-admin spectator, the server must specify a spectator password. Then any client can use these console commands: requestspectator <password> and stopspectating. Note: no quotes are used.

StructureDamageMultiplier.label: StructureDamageMultiplier
StructureDamageMultiplier.description: Value type: floatSpecifies the scaling factor for the damage structures deal with their attacks (i.e., spiked walls). Higher values increase damage. Lower values decrease it.

StructurePickupHoldDuration.label: StructurePickupHoldDuration
StructurePickupHoldDuration.description: Value type: floatSpecifies the quick pick-up hold duration, a value of 0 results in instant pick-up.

StructurePickupTimeAfterPlacement.label: StructurePickupTimeAfterPlacement
StructurePickupTimeAfterPlacement.description: Value type: floatAmount of time in seconds after placement that quick pick-up is available.

StructurePreventResourceRadiusMultiplier.label: StructurePreventResourceRadiusMultiplier
StructurePreventResourceRadiusMultiplier.description: Value type: floatSame as ResourceNoReplenishRadiusStructures in Game.ini. If both settings are set both multiplier will be applied. Can be useful when cannot change the Game.ini file as it works as a command line option too.

StructureResistanceMultiplier.label: StructureResistanceMultiplier
