StructureResistanceMultiplier.description: Value type: floatSpecifies the scaling factor for the resistance to damage structures receive when attacked. The default value 1 provides normal damage. Higher values decrease resistance, increasing damage per attack. Lower values increase it, reducing damage per attack. A value of 0.5 results in a structure taking half damage while a value of 2.0 would result in a structure taking double normal damage.

TamedDinoDamageMultiplier.label: TamedDinoDamageMultiplier
TamedDinoDamageMultiplier.description: Value type: floatSpecifies the scaling factor for the damage tame creatures deal with their attacks. The default value 1 provides normal damage. Higher values increase damage. Lower values decrease it.

TamedDinoResistanceMultiplier.label: TamedDinoResistanceMultiplier
TamedDinoResistanceMultiplier.description: Value type: floatSpecifies the scaling factor for the resistance to damage tame creatures receive when attacked. The default value 1 provides normal damage. Higher values decrease resistance, increasing damage per attack. Lower values increase it, reducing damage per attack. A value of 0.5 results in a structure taking half damage while a value of 2.0 would result in a structure taking double normal damage.

TheMaxStructuresInRange.label: TheMaxStructuresInRange
TheMaxStructuresInRange.description: Value type: integerSpecifies the maximum number of structures that can be constructed within a certain (currently hard-coded) range. Replaces the old value NewMaxStructuresInRange

TribeLogDestroyedEnemyStructures.label: TribeLogDestroyedEnemyStructures
TribeLogDestroyedEnemyStructures.description: Value type: booleanBy default, enemy structure destruction (for the victim tribe) is not displayed in the tribe Logs, set this to true to enable it.

TribeNameChangeCooldown.label: TribeNameChangeCooldown
TribeNameChangeCooldown.description: Value type: floatCool-down, in minutes, in between tribe name changes. Official server use a value of 172800.0 (2 days).

UseFjordurTraversalBuff.label: UseFjordurTraversalBuff
UseFjordurTraversalBuff.description: Value type: booleanIf True, enables the biome teleport in Fjordur when holding R (enabled in official PvE servers).

UseOptimizedHarvestingHealth.label: UseOptimizedHarvestingHealth
UseOptimizedHarvestingHealth.description: Value type: booleanIf True, enables a server harvesting optimization with high HarvestAmountMultiplier (but less rare items). Note: on ARK: Survival Evolved it's suggested to enable this option if harvesting with Tek Stryder causes lag spikes.

CrossARKAllowForeignDinoDownloads.label: CrossARKAllowForeignDinoDownloads
CrossARKAllowForeignDinoDownloads.description: Value type: booleanIf True, enables non-native creatures tribute download on Aberration.

MinimumDinoReuploadInterval.label: MinimumDinoReuploadInterval
MinimumDinoReuploadInterval.description: Value type: floatNumber of seconds cool-down between allowed creature re-uploads (43200 on official Servers which is 12 hours).

noTributeDownloads.label: noTributeDownloads
noTributeDownloads.description: Value type: booleanIf True, prevents CrossArk-data downloads inCross-ARK Data Transfer.

PreventDownloadDinos.label: PreventDownloadDinos
PreventDownloadDinos.description: Value type: booleanIf True, prevents creatures download from ARK Data in Cross-ARK Data Transfer.

PreventDownloadItems.label: PreventDownloadItems
PreventDownloadItems.description: Value type: booleanIf True, prevents items download from ARK Data in Cross-ARK Data Transfer.

PreventDownloadSurvivors.label: PreventDownloadSurvivors
PreventDownloadSurvivors.description: Value type: booleanIf True, prevents survivors download from ARK Data in Cross-ARK Data Transfer.

PreventUploadDinos.label: PreventUploadDinos
PreventUploadDinos.description: Value type: booleanIf True, prevents creatures upload to ARK Data in Cross-ARK Data Transfer.

PreventUploadItems.label: PreventUploadItems
PreventUploadItems.description: Value type: booleanIf True, prevents items upload to ARK Data in Cross-ARK Data Transfer.

PreventUploadSurvivors.label: PreventUploadSurvivors
PreventUploadSurvivors.description: Value type: booleanIf True, prevents survivors upload to ARK Data in Cross-ARK Data Transfer.

TributeCharacterExpirationSeconds.label: TributeCharacterExpirationSeconds
TributeCharacterExpirationSeconds.description: Value type: integerSet in seconds the expiration timer for uploaded survivors in ARK Data. With default or negative values there is no expiration time. Check Cross-ARK Data Transfer for more details. Warning: do not set this option to an insane high value, like more than 31536000 seconds (which is 1 year), as in ARK Data routines this is summed to upload time in Unix Epoch time format. Using really high values will result in overflow and may cause upload time checks to fail and ARK Data deleted. Finally, it is highly suggested to use the same value across all servers in a cluster, otherwise accessing ARK Data from a server with a lower value will result data deletion if in that server the timer is expired.

TributeDinoExpirationSeconds.label: TributeDinoExpirationSeconds
TributeDinoExpirationSeconds.description: Value type: integerSet in seconds the expiration timer for uploaded tames in ARK Data. If set to 0 or less will revert to default. Check Cross-ARK Data Transfer for more details. Warning: do not set this option to an insane high value, like more than 31536000 seconds (which is 1 year), as in ARK Data routines this is summed to upload time in Unix Epoch time format. Using really high values will result in overflow and may cause upload time checks to fail and ARK Data deleted. Finally, it is highly suggested to use the same value across all servers in a cluster, otherwise accessing ARK Data from a server with a lower value will result data deletion if in that server the timer is expired.

TributeItemExpirationSeconds.label: TributeItemExpirationSeconds
TributeItemExpirationSeconds.description: Value type: integerSet in seconds the expiration timer for uploaded items in ARK Data. If set to 0 or less will revert to default. Check Cross-ARK Data Transfer for more details. Warning: do not set this option to an insane high value, like more than 31536000 seconds (which is 1 year), as in ARK Data routines this is summed to upload time in Unix Epoch time format. Using really high values will result in overflow and may cause upload time checks to fail and ARK Data deleted. Finally, it is highly suggested to use the same value across all servers in a cluster, otherwise accessing ARK Data from a server with a lower value will result data deletion if in that server the timer is expired.

CryopodNerfDamageMult.label: CryopodNerfDamageMult
CryopodNerfDamageMult.description: Value type: floatReduces the amount of damage dealt by the creature after it is deployed from the cryopod, as a percentage of total damage output, and for the length of time set by CryopodNerfDuration. CryopodNerfDuration needs to be set as well. CryopodNerfDamageMult=0.01 means 99% of the damage is removed. On official it is set to 0.1.

CryopodNerfDuration.label: CryopodNerfDuration
CryopodNerfDuration.description: Value type: integerAmount of time, in seconds, Cryosickness lasts after deploying a creature from a Cryopod. Note: although at code level it is defined as a floating-point number, it is suggested to use an integer instead. On official it is set to 10.0.

CryopodNerfIncomingDamageMultPercent.label: CryopodNerfIncomingDamageMultPercent
CryopodNerfIncomingDamageMultPercent.description: Value type: floatIncreases the amount of damage taken by the creature after it is deployed from the cryopod, as a percentage of total damage received, and for the length of time set by CryopodNerfDuration. CryopodNerfIncomingDamageMultPercent=0.25 means a released tame takes 25% more damage while the debuff lasts. On official it is set to 0.25.

EnableCryopodNerf.label: EnableCryopodNerf
EnableCryopodNerf.description: Value type: booleanIf True, there is no Cryopod cooldown timer, and creatures do not become unconscious. If this option is set, than EnableCryopodNerf and CryopodNerfIncomingDamageMultPercent must be set as well or they will default to 0.

EnableCryoSicknessPVE.label: EnableCryoSicknessPVE
EnableCryoSicknessPVE.description: Value type: booleanIf True, enables Cryopod cooldown timer when deploying a creature.

BadWordListURL.label: BadWordListURL
BadWordListURL.description: Value type: string with a URLAdd the URL to hosting your own bad words list. Note: on ARK: Survival Evolved servers only the HTTP protocol is supported (an HTTPS URL will not work).

BadWordWhiteListURL.label: BadWordWhiteListURL
BadWordWhiteListURL.description: Value type: string with a URLAdd the URL to hosting your own good words list. Note: on ARK: Survival Evolved servers only the HTTP protocol is supported (an HTTPS URL will not work).

bFilterCharacterNames.label: bFilterCharacterNames
bFilterCharacterNames.description: Value type: booleanIf True, filters out character names based on the bad words/good words list.

bFilterChat.label: bFilterChat
bFilterChat.description: Value type: booleanIf True, filters out character names based on the bad word/good words list.

bFilterTribeNames.label: bFilterTribeNames
bFilterTribeNames.description: Value type: booleanIf True, filters out tribe names based on the badwords/goodwords list.

AllowDeprecatedStructures.label: AllowDeprecatedStructures
AllowDeprecatedStructures.description: Value type: booleanIf True, allows servers to keep the Halloween Structures for a while after event ends (had to be used before relaunching the server with 222.3 update). Since no more events are planned to be activated or removed, this feature can be considered deprecated.

ForceFlyerExplosives.label: ForceFlyerExplosives
ForceFlyerExplosives.description: Value type: booleanIf True, allowed flyers (except Quetzal and Wyvern) to fly with C4 attached to it. Deprecated since 253.95.

MaxStructuresInRange.label: MaxStructuresInRange
MaxStructuresInRange.description: Value type: integerSpecifies the maximum number of structures that can be constructed within a certain (currently hard-coded) range. Deprecated with patch 188.0 by NewMaxStructuresInRange.

NewMaxStructuresInRange.label: NewMaxStructuresInRange
NewMaxStructuresInRange.description: Value type: integerSpecifies the maximum number of structures that can be constructed within a certain (currently hard-coded) range. Deprecated with patch 252.1 by TheMaxStructuresInRange.

PvEStructureDecayDestructionPeriod.label: PvEStructureDecayDestructionPeriod
PvEStructureDecayDestructionPeriod.description: Value type: integerSpecified the time required for player structures to decay in PvE mode. Deprecated and no more present in executable bits with patch 180.0 where each type of structure has its own decay time, increasing with "tier quality".

AdminListURL.label: AdminListURL
AdminListURL.description: Value type: string with a URLAlternative to AllowedCheaterAccountIDs.txt (see Administrator Whitelisting) using a web resource. The interval at which the server queries the resource to check for admin list update is defined by UpdateAllowedCheatersInterval. Undocumented by Wildcard.

AllowedCheatersURL.label: AllowedCheatersURL
AllowedCheatersURL.description: Value type: string with a URLAlternative to AllowedCheaterSteamIDs.txt (see Administrator Whitelisting) using a web resource (e.g.: official uses http://arkdedicated.com/globaladmins.txt). The interval at which the server queries the resource to check for admin list update is defined by UpdateAllowedCheatersInterval Note: it supports the HTTP protocol only (HTTPS is not supported). Undocumented by Wildcard.

AutoRestartIntervalSeconds.label: AutoRestartIntervalSeconds
AutoRestartIntervalSeconds.description: Value type: floatDefines the time (in seconds) after which the server will automatically restart. Undocumented by Wildcard.(Appears to shut off the server instead of restarting properly)

ChatLogFileSplitIntervalSeconds.label: ChatLogFileSplitIntervalSeconds
ChatLogFileSplitIntervalSeconds.description: Value type: integerControls how to split the chat log file related to time in seconds. Cannot be set to a value lower than 45 (will default to 45 if the value is lower). Set to 0 only in official. Undocumented by Wildcard.

ChatLogFlushIntervalSeconds.label: ChatLogFlushIntervalSeconds
ChatLogFlushIntervalSeconds.description: Value type: integerControls in how many second the chat log is flushed to log file. Cannot be set to a value lower than 15 (will default to 15 if the value is lower). Set to 0 only in official. Undocumented by Wildcard.

ChatLogMaxAgeInDays.label: ChatLogMaxAgeInDays
ChatLogMaxAgeInDays.description: Value type: integerControls how many days the chat log is long. Set it to a negative value will result it to set at -1 (virtually infinite). Set to 0 only in official. Undocumented by Wildcard.

DontRestoreBackup.label: DontRestoreBackup
DontRestoreBackup.description: Value type: booleanIf True and -DisableDupeLogDeletes is present, prevents the server to automatically restore a backup in case of corrupted save. Undocumented by Wildcard.

EnableAFKKickPlayerCountPercent.label: EnableAFKKickPlayerCountPercent
EnableAFKKickPlayerCountPercent.description: Value type: floatEnables the idle timeout to be applied only if the amount of online players reaches percentage value related to MaxPlayers argument. The percentage is expressed as normalised value between 0 and 1.0, where 1.0 means 100%. Official set it to 0.89999998. Undocumented by Wildcard.

EnableMeshBitingProtection.label: EnableMeshBitingProtection
EnableMeshBitingProtection.description: Value type: booleanIf False, disables mesh biting protection. Undocumented by Wildcard.

FreezeReaperPregnancy.label: FreezeReaperPregnancy
FreezeReaperPregnancy.description: Value type: booleanIf True, freezes the Reaper King pregnancy timer and experience gain. Undocumented by Wildcard.

LogChatMessages.label: LogChatMessages
LogChatMessages.description: Value type: booleanIf True, enables advanced chat logging. Chat logs will be saved in ShooterGame/Saved/Logs/ChatLogs/<SessionName>/ in json format. Disabled on official. The file will be split according to ChatLogFileSplitIntervalSeconds value and flushed every ChatLogFlushIntervalSeconds seconds value. Note: <SessionName> will be written without spaces. Undocumented by Wildcard.

MaxStructuresInSmallRadius.label: MaxStructuresInSmallRadius
MaxStructuresInSmallRadius.description: Value type: integerDefines the amount of max structures allowed to be placed in a RadiusStructuresInSmallRadius from player position. Official set it to 40. Undocumented by Wildcard.

MaxStructuresToProcess.label: MaxStructuresToProcess
MaxStructuresToProcess.description: Value type: integerControls the max batch size of structures to process (e.g.: culling, building graphs modifications, etc) at each server tick. Leaving at 0 (default behaviour) will force the server to process all structures in queue. It's a trade-off between how much can cost a server tick (worst case scenario) and simulation accuracy. Official set it to 5000. Undocumented by Wildcard.

PreventOutOfTribePinCodeUse.label: PreventOutOfTribePinCodeUse
PreventOutOfTribePinCodeUse.description: Value type: booleanIf True, prevents out of tribe players to use pins on structures (doors, elevators, storage boxes, etc). Undocumented by Wildcard.

RadiusStructuresInSmallRadius.label: RadiusStructuresInSmallRadius
RadiusStructuresInSmallRadius.description: Value type: floatDefines the small radius dimension (in Unreal Units) used by MaxStructuresInSmallRadius. Official set it to 225.0. Undocumented by Wildcard.

ServerEnableMeshChecking.label: ServerEnableMeshChecking
ServerEnableMeshChecking.description: Value type: booleanInvolved in foliage repopulation. Takes no effect if -forcedisablemeshchecking is set. Enabled on official. Undocumented.

TribeMergeAllowed.label: TribeMergeAllowed
TribeMergeAllowed.description: Value type: booleanIf False, prevents tribe to merge. Undocumented by Wildcard.

TribeMergeCooldown.label: TribeMergeCooldown
TribeMergeCooldown.description: Value type: floatTribe merge cool-down in seconds. Official uses 86400.0. Undocumented by Wildcard.

UpdateAllowedCheatersInterval.label: UpdateAllowedCheatersInterval
UpdateAllowedCheatersInterval.description: Value type: floatTimes in seconds at which the remote admin list linked by AllowedCheatersURL is queried for updates. Any value less than 3.0 will be reverted to 3.0. Undocumented by Wildcard.

UseCharacterTracker.label: UseCharacterTracker
UseCharacterTracker.description: Value type: booleanUsed to enable character tracking. Alternatively, this option can be configured with -disableCharacterTracker argument in the command line (note that the argument from command line has priority over the value set in GameUserSettings.ini). Undocumented by Wildcard.

UseExclusiveList.label: UseExclusiveList
UseExclusiveList.description: Value type: booleanIf True, allows same behaviour as -exclusivejoin. Undocumented by Wildcard.

ListenServerTetherDistanceMultiplier.label: ListenServerTetherDistanceMultiplier
ListenServerTetherDistanceMultiplier.description: Value type: floatScales the tether distance between host and other players on non-dedicated sessions only. Note: despite being readable from command line, this option affects non-dedicated sessions only, thus it has to be set in the GameUserSettings.ini file or through the in-game local host graphics menu.

MultiHome.label: MultiHome
MultiHome.description: If True, enables multihoming. MultiHome IP must be specified in [SessionSettings] or in command line as well.

MaxPlayers.label: Max Players
MaxPlayers.description: Specifies the maximum number of players that can play on the server simultaneously. ASA: This setting is replaced with -WinLiveMaxPlayers in the command line options, as otherwise, it will force it back to the default value.

AllowMultipleTamedUnicorns.label: AllowMultipleTamedUnicorns
AllowMultipleTamedUnicorns.description: Value type: booleanFalse = one unicorn on the map at a time, True = one wild and unlimited tamed Unicorns on the map.

EnableVolcano.label: EnableVolcano
EnableVolcano.description: Value type: booleanFalse = disabled (the volcano will not become active), True = enabled

UnicornSpawnInterval.label: UnicornSpawnInterval
UnicornSpawnInterval.description: Value type: integerHow long in hours the game should wait before spawning a new Unicorn if the wild one is killed (or tamed, if AllowMultipleTamedUnicorns is enabled). This value sets the minimum amount of time (in hours), and the maximum is equal to 2x this value.

VolcanoIntensity.label: VolcanoIntensity
VolcanoIntensity.description: Value type: floatThe lower the value, the more intense the volcano's eruption will be. Recommended to leave at 1. The minimum value is 0.25, and for multiplayer games, it should not go below 0.5. Very high numbers will basically disable the flaming rocks flung out of the volcano.

VolcanoInterval.label: VolcanoInterval
VolcanoInterval.description: Value type: integer0 = 5000 (min) - 15000 (max) seconds between instances of the volcano becoming active. Any number above 0 acts as a multiplier, with a minimum value of .1

Duration.label: Duration
Duration.description: Value type: integerSpecifies in seconds the duration of the displayed message on player log-in.

Message.label: Message
Message.description:
A single line string for a message displayed to played once logged-in. No quotes needed. Use 
 to start a new line in the message.
